reviewText: This is an excellant movie for those interested in the life of a gambler, and the Bristish society of high society gamblers.  The Lucan story tells of a lord addicted to nothing but gambling and a disregard for his family, inheritance;and his comtempt for his wife.  How the nanny was murdered in connection with mistaken identiy and the haterd for his wife.  if enjoyed this movie producer/writer Jeff Pope brings.  As in all Pope's movies, he attempts to bring truth.
